title: I'm getting depressed because in just less than a month I have an important exam and I don't feel like studying at all. What shall I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: You are depressed, because you did not study, so now start study to feel better, study is only solution right now for your depression and for your exam also, and one month it's enough time for score better marks. And some one saying it to good that something is better than nothing, aand mostly engineer getting good marks at one night fight with full of potential try to do smart study, take help of friends for notes etc... All the best
